p: Unless stated otherwise, all biophysical impacts are expressed as absolute or relative yield change between the reference period 1971–2000 with BAU crop management (baseline) and the respective estimates for the +2°C period. Differences between mean yield values were statistically evaluated using the two‐tailed paired t‐test where appropriate, while linear regressions were tested by the F‐test. All statistical analyses and plotting were done in R (R Core Team, 2016). In Section 3.2, the sums of daily temperature and precipitation over the growing seasons of all crops were calculated to support the analysis therein.
